Question: Which of the following characters are part of the Armitage family in *Get Out*?
Options:
A. Allison Williams as Rose Armitage
B. Bradley Whitford as Dean Armitage
C. Catherine Keener as Missy Armitage
D. Daniel Kaluuya as Chris Washington
Answer: Allison Williams as Rose Armitage, Bradley Whitford as Dean Armitage, Catherine Keener as Missy Armitage
